about_the_game:
About the game


  • Are you a collector?
  • Do you enjoy completing?
  • And you are a fan of pixel art and cute items?

Then this game is for you!
Collect unique Pixelart items in this exciting game! Earn 1-4 tickets every 2 hours and use it to spin the lucky wheel for a chance to win a pixel art item of the ticket's rarity or a higher rarity ticket. All items are added to your Steam inventory and are fully marketable, allowing you to complete your collections with ease. Join the fun and start building your Pixelart collection today!

The item/ticket drop chances are specifically designed so that there are some very rare items. Those items will be hard to get and thus all the more rewarding when you actually get one.
Nevertheless it is designed so that you should get the necessary amount of each rarity in each drop pool (if you idle enough).

Please keep in mind that I am a solo developer and more features are planned for the game.

Features

  • In-game inventory: To view your beautiful collection
  • Merchant: To recycle items you don't want anymore.
  • Favorite shelf: To display your favorite item on the main screen

Discord

If you want to stay informed about updates and promotions or just want to chat.

About drops

  • You can get 1-4 tickets every 2 hours (also a Steam inventory item).
  • The possible items you get for a ticket are dependent on the ticket's rarity.
  • You can get rarer tickets by spinning the wheel and having some luck.
  • More infos and exact drop table/probabilities can be found on the discord.

This is just an example and not the current drop pool:

Drop rotation

The possible drops will change every once in a while to keep things fresh and allow the items to maintain a certain rarity/value. The specific timeframe is not yet determined but I will try to aim for one week.

Important

  • The game's item/ticket drops are not hackable:
    Everything concerning item and ticket drops is managed through the Steam inventory service. It will never give a ticket before the 2 hours are up and it will only give a random item by consuming a ticket of the correct rarity.

Suggestions/Feedback

I am always open to suggestions and feedback. This is the first game I published and the first one I ever made using the Steam inventory service. If you have ideas or even some pixel art you think would fit in the game, feel free to contact me.

-----------------------------
Have fun collecting!

name: Pixel Collector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 256
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 256
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Collect Pixelart items! Get 1-4 tickets every 2 hours to spin the lucky wheel. Win pixelart items or higher rarity tickets! All items appear in your Steam inventory and are tradable/marketable, making it easier to complete your collections.
supported_languages:
